00009 class t_tool_paintgrid_singlepixel: public t_editortool
00010 {
00011     private:
00012     
00013     public:
00014         t_tool_paintgrid_singlepixel(t_editor *e): t_editortool(e)
00015         {
00016             mouse_buttons= 0;
00017         }
00018         
00019         void phys_tick(float time)
00020         {
00021             t_editortool::phys_tick(time);
00022             
00023             t_grid *grid= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->grid;
00024             
00025             float intensity= 50;
00026             float f= (mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(1)? +intensity*time: mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(3)? -intensity*time: 0);
00027             
00028             if(f) for(int i= 0; i<10; i++)
00029             {
00030                 vec pos= mouse_img_pos;
00031                 pos.random_deviation(50);
00032                 grid->paint_pixel_additive(pos, f);
00033             }
00034         }
00035         
00036         void drawhint()
00037         {
00038         }
00039 };

00043 class t_tool_paintgrid_spraycan: public t_editortool
00044 {
00045     private:
00046         float intensity;
00047         float radius;
00048         int amount;
00049     
00050     public:
00051         t_tool_paintgrid_spraycan(t_editor *e): t_editortool(e), intensity(0.25), radius(3.0), amount(8)
00052         {
00053             mouse_buttons= 0;
00054         }
00055         
00056         void phys_tick(float time)
00057         {
00058             t_editortool::phys_tick(time);
00059 
00060             if(mouse_buttons&(SDL_BUTTON(1)|SDL_BUTTON(3)))
00061             {
00062                 t_grid *grid= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->grid;
00063                 t_brush *brush= editor->getbrush();
00064                 for(int i= 0; i<amount; i++)
00065                 {
00066                     vec pos(mouse_img_pos.x - brush->getwidth()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5, mouse_img_pos.y - brush->getheight()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5);
00067                     pos.random_deviation(radius);
00068                     grid->paint_pixels_additive( pos.mul(1.0/GRIDGRANULARITY), 
00069                                                  brush->getpixels(), brush->getwidth(), brush->getheight(), mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(1)? time*intensity: -time*intensity );
00070                 }
00071             }
00072         }
00073         
00074         void drawhint()
00075         {
00076         }
00077 };

00079 class t_tool_paintgrid_brush: public t_editortool
00080 {
00081     private:
00082         float intensity;
00083     
00084     public:
00085         t_tool_paintgrid_brush(t_editor *e): t_editortool(e), intensity(0.05)
00086         {
00087             mouse_buttons= 0;
00088         }
00089         
00090         void phys_tick(float time)
00091         {
00092             t_editortool::phys_tick(time);
00093         }
00094         
00095         void mousepaint()
00096         {
00097             t_grid *grid= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->grid;
00098             t_brush *brush= editor->getbrush();
00099             vec pos(lerpedmousepos.x - brush->getwidth()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5, lerpedmousepos.y - brush->getheight()*GRIDGRANULARITY*0.5);
00100             grid->paint_pixels_additive( pos.mul(1.0/GRIDGRANULARITY), brush->getpixels(), brush->getwidth(), brush->getheight(), mouse_buttons&SDL_BUTTON(1)? intensity: -intensity );
00101         }
00102         
00103         void mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00104         {
00105             t_editortool::mouse_button_event(evt);
00106             if(mouse_buttons&(SDL_BUTTON(1)|SDL_BUTTON(3))) mousepaint();
00107         }
00108         
00109         void mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &evt)
00110         {
00111             t_editortool::mouse_motion_event(evt);
00112             if(mouse_buttons&(SDL_BUTTON(1)|SDL_BUTTON(3))) mousepaint();
00113         }
00114         
00115         void drawhint()
00116         {
00117         }
00118 };

00145 class t_tool_addparticles: public t_editortool
00146 {
00147     private:
00148         vec smoothedmousedelta;
00149 
00150         float radius;
00151         float amount;
00152         float amountleft;
00153         
00154     public:
00155         t_tool_addparticles(t_editor *e): t_editortool(e)
00156         {
00157             mouse_buttons= 0;
00158             radius= 35, amount= 10, amountleft= 0;
00159         }
00160         
00161         void phys_tick(float time);
00162         
00163         void paint();
00164         void erase();
00165         
00166         void mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00167         {
00168             t_editortool::mouse_button_event(evt);
00169         }
00170         
00171         void mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &evt)
00172         {
00173             t_editortool::mouse_motion_event(evt);
00174             
00175             vec v(evt.xrel-smoothedmousedelta.x, evt.yrel-smoothedmousedelta.y);
00176             v.mul(0.5);
00177             smoothedmousedelta.add(v);
00178         }
00179         
00180         void drawhint()
00181         {
00182         }
00183 };
